item.title: HW Assignment #1
item.description: Summary of this week’s homework assignment: Due Date: Wednesday, September 18th Complete Homework #1 - JS Basics, Control Flow & Loops You are tasked with completing the problem set which is hosted on Github, see the url below: Github Repo for Homework #1 - JS Basics, Control Flow & Loops Use the Assignment Submission Git Workflow (detailed here) to access and submit the assignment
